title: Gamification-Enhanced Language Learning Motivation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational language pedagogy and digital tool administration skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining digital devices and offline activities, applying game-based motivation techniques in language education for current elementary education practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can present educational design plans incorporating game elements (challenge, curiosity, control, fantasy) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze intrinsic motivation factors (Challenge, Curiosity, Control, Fantasy) when designing educational games and apply them to learning models.
Learners can design three or more language learning activities using gamification tools and measure motivational effects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
